column1: # Complete configuration supporting both STOCKS and CRYPTO trading
# Alpaca Trading API credentials and authentication
# Alpaca Stocks Market Data API credentials
# Alpaca Stocks Market Data API Endpoints
# Polygon.io Crypto API credentials (REQUIRED FOR CRYPTO MODE)
# EASY MODE SWITCHING - JUST CHANGE 2 LINES ABOVE!
# ALL APIs ARE CONFIGURED - SYSTEM AUTOMATICALLY USES THE RIGHT ONES:
#   - Uses: Alpaca Trading + Alpaca Stocks APIs
#   - Uses: Alpaca Trading + Polygon Crypto APIs
# TO SWITCH: Just change trading_mode.mode and primary_symbol above!
